name: Prostasia Foundation
memberOrga: We do not currently have any member organizations because we have only recently been formed and are in a pre-launch crowdfunding period. Our official launch date will be in mid-2018.
goal: To compile, fund, and disseminate the results of research on the prevention of child sexual abuse, which can be used in advocacy for child protection laws, corporate policies, and enforcement procedures that are constitutional and evidence-based.
interests: Culture and media, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Youth
euInitiatives: Public consultation on measures to further improve the effectiveness of the fight against illegal content online.
